duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first & second tier desktop support for all end-users
Proactively monitor ticketing systems, ensuring all tickets are updated daily, and all work is fully documented detail
Configure and deploy new desktop and laptop computers using company computer image
Quickly diagnose and resolve hardware issues including computers, printers, and peripherals
Initiate and execute manufacturer warranty requests
Quickly diagnose and resolve issues from a broad range of applications
Set up A/V, teleconferencing and video conferencing equipment for meetings
Perform hardware relocations for desk moves/reshuffles
Coordinate and collaborate effectively with technical teams
Establish and maintain good working relationship with users and associates

education_certification.credential: High school diploma. Related IT certifications and/or experience providing general IT desktop support in a corporate environment.
